title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. However, when searching for declarations, no results are found. It should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
EB: The search should first try to get the Java element and, if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click and choose 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the Search dialog, search for declarations.
5. Notice that no results are found.

Expected: The search should return results based on the element name instead of the fully qualified name.

NOTES:
